name: omegle-chat-app
description: Anonymous chat application with frontend and backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
